name: Ambition of caesar
summary: Warrior of Rome, also known as Caesar no Yabou (シーザーの野望?, "Ambition of Caesar"), is a real-time strategy video game for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis. The game is a fictional story about the adventures of Julius Caesar and the Roman army during his reign as general in the year 48 BCE. The game had a sequel, Warrior of Rome II
